participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and determined, always looking for ways to improve himself and the world around him.
participant_1.background: I have been struggling with my mental health recently. I think if I work hard enough I can fix the world. I especially enjoy listening to the band The Lumineers. My position is linebacker. I like listening to music that helps me feel more confident and comfortable in my own skin.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Introverted but passionate about her interests, finding joy in hobbies and family moments.
participant_2.background: I am a loner, but I do enjoy my hobbies. I'm proud of my daughter and mom! I sometimes have a hard time relating to people who don't share my interests. My friend once bought me a car. I enjoy my bike rides with some tunes in my ears.

content.text: Not much really, just enjoying some music.
Oh, what are you listening to?
The Lumineers. I just found out about them recently and I really enjoy their music.
Oh yeah, they're really good! I've been listening to them for a while.
I really like "Hey Ho" and "Ho Hey". What about you?
"Ho Hey" is my favorite too! I also like "Gloria".
Yeah, Gloria is a good one.
It's nice to meet someone who also likes The Lumineers.
Me too! I've been trying to get my friends to listen to them, but they're not really into it.
Yeah, I know what you mean. My friends aren't really into them either.
Well, at least we have each other.
Right! We can be Lumineers buddies.
